subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The daughter of the former Yankees pitcher Bill Gullickson and the niece of the former Nets general manager Kiki Vandeweghe are among those receiving wild-card invitations to the United States Open.
snippet: The daughter of the former Yankees pitcher Bill Gullickson and the niece of the former Nets general manager Kiki Vandeweghe are among those receiving wild-card invitations to the United States Open.
